name: Rocket Pogo Lab
description:
------- THIS GAME IS ONLY A PROTOTYPE ------

In this game prototype you will be piloting a experimental rocket powered pogostick.

INFO

-There is currently only one level.

-Has controller support!

Controls

-On controller

-Left Stick to Turn

-HOLD A to jump

-HOLD B to boost

-On mouse and keyboard

-A and D keys to Turn

-HOLD Left mouse to jump

-HOLD Right mouse to boost

PS

This is my first project. As i am learning I welcome any and all feedback!
